ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Erp.Web") from Benner.Erp.Web import AuthorizationHelper
widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = AuthorizationHelper.HasTask("MANTER_GRUPOTRIBUTACAO") widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = AuthorizationHelper.HasTask("MANTER_GRUPOTRIBUTACAO") widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = AuthorizationHelper.HasTask("EXCLUIR_GRUPOTRIBUTACAO")
form = widget.ProviderWidget if (form == None) : return
entity = form.Entity if (entity == None) : return
widget.Hidden = not ((entity["TIPOBASECALCULO"].GetDBValue() == 2 or entity["TIPOBASECALCULO"].GetDBValue() == 1) and (entity["TIPOMARGEM"].GetDBValue() == "F"))
